spacer.description: A spacer is the invisible space between elements. The unit is supplied by the size transform (default rem)

sm.description: The general size for a small space.

md.description: The general size for a medium space.

lg.description: The general size for a large space.

xl.description: The general size for a extra large space.

sm.description: Defaults to the negative version of the small spacer.

md.description: A negative version of the medium spacer.

lg.description: A negative version of the large spacer.

xl.description: A negative version of the extra large spacer.
